resources.string: Felt persistent sad, anxious or empty mood
Been sleeping too little or too much
Had a loss of appetite and weight loss or increase appetite and increase weight
Lost of interest or pleasure in activities you once enjoyed
Please consult a therapist as soon as possible
Please talk out to family or friedns, that might help.
Try some exercise, they\'re great mood enhancer
You\'re doing good, try to do some activity which makes you joyful
You\'re cloud nine, High five to that. Spread your happiness
